title: Reincarnated Into Other World With Cheat Like Ability ~Internet Was Strongest Even In Other World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life
tags: Cheats   Guilds   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Transmigration
author: 王水
description:
The youth who was reincarnated into other-world, Minamiya Kouya who given tons of cheat like ability.

And the one he liked the most out of all those cheats was . Having gained this ability, the protagonist utilized it to do whatever he wants, such as; infiltrate the economy with Japanese products ordered from Japanese online store, requesting Japanese company to build a building using latest technology from Japan.

This is an assimilation of Japanese culture in a world of swords and magic.>
